explains: adj. 持续一星期的；为期一周的

sentences.en: After that, I attended the week-long seminar.
sentences.cn: 在那之后，我参加了一场长达一周的研讨会。

sentences.en: Demonstrators jeered the mayor as he arrived for a week-long visit.
sentences.cn: 示威者们在市长到达进行为期一周访问的时候嘲弄了他。

sentences.en: They cleaned up the river as part of a week-long environmental camp.
sentences.cn: 他们清理了这条河，这是为期一周的环保营的一部分。
